name: User Panel Lite
author: Filter Action

sections.description:
The User Panel Lite plugin allows administrators to easily track all its users in one place. The User Panel Lite has been created via the WordPress administrative interface.

Docs & Support

You can find docs and more detailed information about User Panel Lite on filteraction.com. If you were unable to find the answer to your question on the FAQ or in any of the documentation, you should check the support forum on WordPress.org. If you can’t locate any topics that pertain to your particular issue, post a new topic for it.

Donations
sections.installation:
1. Upload user-panel-lite folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload user-panel-lite folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: User Panel Lite is a responsive User Panel plugin for WordPress with which you could able to view all your users under a single roof.
